name: Silverfalls Kush
description: Silverfalls Kush is a disease-resistant strain that is known to grow strong and tall in many different environments. Its 50/50 hybrid genetics make it versatile and well suited for mood enhancement and paint relief. This particular Kush is highly sought after as an outdoor strain due to its resilient genetics and strong effects that make it enjoyable both at home or outdoors.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Giggly, Happy, Hungry, Cramps, Pain, Stress, Inflammation, Insomnia, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
